name: Chick Road Rage
description:
The farmer has lost all his chickens, but they remember the way home and are ready to return, however, their path is full of difficulties and obstacles. Rivers with floating logs and cars flying past. The most important rule is that everyone must survive!

ChickRoadRage is a Top Down game where the player controls a bunch of chickens one at a time, moving them across the road, floating on logs, and dodging cars.

Control:
WASD - walking

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Music
- Difficulty
